Text.Value: *The sky splits open, and nautiloids pour out of a void that consumes the stars.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Complex Description] Vision of a sky where a nautiloids poured out of a void and consume the stars., [simple description] DUPE (GOB_GoblinKing_Scrying d603efbd-2443-d7f8-e775-22fe3ff18fd6) The player experiencing a vision

Text.Value: No! Stop it! Stop it, you wretched worm!

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Mindflayer][Player] *REUSE* SWD_Loop
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Distressed, furious, maybe banging a hand against his head.
EditorData.NodeContext: Starts off scolding, but is very angry by the third line. This thing has invaded his head - Astarion has no tolerence for that.

Text.Value: *You watch through the creature's eyes as it curses the star-born slaves.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Complex description] Vision of a Mindflayer enraged and cursing, [simple description] DUPE (GOB_GoblinKing_Scrying d603efbd-2443-d7f8-e775-22fe3ff18fd6) The player experiencing a vision

Text.Value: How do I get rid of this parasite?
*You see the tadpole in the mind flayer's hand. Not a parasite: perfection.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Complex description] Vision of a Mindflayer holding a Tadpole. Lots of focus on the Tadpole, [simple description] DUPE (GOB_GoblinKing_Scrying d603efbd-2443-d7f8-e775-22fe3ff18fd6) The player experiencing a vision

Text.Value: *Rebirth is sloughing flesh. A new skull housing cold, sharp intellect.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Complex description] Vision of an unknowed person that suffer. crouch out of frame and come back as a Mindflayer, [simple description] DUPE (GOB_GoblinKing_Scrying d603efbd-2443-d7f8-e775-22fe3ff18fd6) The player experiencing a vision

Text.Value: *Fractured images fill your mind: curved drow blades, crude goblin torches, gnoll teeth dripping blood.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Complex description] flash of drow blades, crude goblin torch, gnoll teeth fripping blood., [simple description] DUPE (GOB_GoblinKing_Scrying d603efbd-2443-d7f8-e775-22fe3ff18fd6) The player experiencing a vision

Text.Value: Tell me who the Absolute is.
*You see Dror Ragzlin writhe. A tadpole clings to the mind flayer's fingers.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Complex description] Mindflayer approching Dror Ragzlin with a Tadpole in hand, [simple description] DUPE (GOB_GoblinKing_Scrying d603efbd-2443-d7f8-e775-22fe3ff18fd6) The player experiencing a vision

Text.Value: *You see dark tunnels lit by noxious pools of brine. The darkness spreads through the earth.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [^Complex description] Vision of a tunnel lighted by noxious pools. There is lots of daken place in this tunnel., [simple description] DUPE (GOB_GoblinKing_Scrying d603efbd-2443-d7f8-e775-22fe3ff18fd6) The player experiencing a vision

Text.Value: Leave.
Agh... my tadpole... it's just like on the ship...

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Mindflayer][Player] *REUSE* SWD_Loop
EditorData.NodeContext: Wincing in discomfort as a the tadpole in her head reacts to a mind flayer corpse.

Text.Value: *There's no doubt - this ghaik is responsible for your parasite. And it's waiting for your questions.*
*There's no doubt - this creature is responsible for your parasite. And it's waiting for your questions.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Mindflayer][Player] *REUSE* SWD_Loop
EditorData.NodeContext: For gith speakers: "Ghaik" is pronounced GAYK

Text.Value: *They want the ones from the ship. Darkness and sun, barely contained.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Complex Description] Vision of the hiding place of the weapon. Hidden in the shadow so we dont realy see what it is., [simple description] DUPE (GOB_GoblinKing_Scrying d603efbd-2443-d7f8-e775-22fe3ff18fd6) The player experiencing a vision

Text.Value: Are there more of your kind nearby?
*The goblin king bows, obedient. The flesh of his tribe becomes the flesh of the Absolute.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Goblin King bowed in front of the Mindflayer. He rise up in front of the Mindflayer., [simple description] DUPE (GOB_GoblinKing_Scrying d603efbd-2443-d7f8-e775-22fe3ff18fd6) The player experiencing a vision

Text.Value: *As the corpse rises, your parasite squirms in recognition.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Mindflayer] *REUSE* Speak with the dead LoopIn, then Loop <SimonG>
EditorData.InternalNodeContext: The corpse is animated in the Goblin Camp.

Text.Value: Why did you abduct me?
Do you... do you feel it too?

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Mindflayer][Player] *REUSE* SWD_Loop
EditorData.NodeContext: Disturbed. Wants to know if you could feel the paraiste in your head too.

Text.Value: *The ghaik's corpse twitches, then collapses again. It will speak no more.*
*The mind flayer's corpse twitches, then collapses again. It will speak no more.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Mindflayer] Speak with the dead animation loopIN and LoopOut

Text.Value: *The ghaik's corpse twitches, then collapses again. It will speak no more.*
*The mind flayer's corpse twitches, then collapses again. It will speak no more.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: DUPE [Mindflayer] Speak with the dead animation loopIN and LoopOut

Text.Value: Pa'vrylk! I feel it in me.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Mindflayer][Player] *REUSE* SWD_Loop
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel clutches her head in pain

Text.Value: The tadpole stirs. It recognises its master...

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Mindflayer][Player] *REUSE* SWD_Loop

Text.Value: *You see other mind flayers arranged in a serene circle. Absolute unity. Absolute power.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Complex description] flash of multiple Mindflayers arranged in cercle, [simple description] DUPE (GOB_GoblinKing_Scrying d603efbd-2443-d7f8-e775-22fe3ff18fd6) The player experiencing a vision

Text.Value: Why did my kin attack your ship?
Why did the dragon-riders attack the ship?
*Dark, empty pods flicker across your vision. They demand new flesh.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Complex description] Vision of dark, empty pods., , [simple description] DUPE (GOB_GoblinKing_Scrying d603efbd-2443-d7f8-e775-22fe3ff18fd6) The player experiencing a vision

Text.Value: Ugh... that thing is burrowing through my brain.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Mindflayer][Player] *REUSE* SWD_Loop

Text.Value: What does the Absolute want from the goblins?

Synopsis: The player casts speak with dead on the corpse of the mind flayer that tortured them at the beginning of the game.
